hero.subtitle: Capture your thoughts, conversations, and decisions. Let AI organize, summarize, and surface the right memories at the right time—all running locally on your machine.

memory.title: Continuous Memory
memory.description: Automatically captures interactions and structures them with semantic understanding.

aiModels.title: Any AI Model
aiModels.description: Use OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini, or run models locally.

tools.title: Tools & Skills
tools.description: Extend your AI with custom tools and skills.
tools.examples: Web browsing, code execution, API calls

search.title: Semantic Search
search.description: Find memories by meaning, not just keywords.

voice.title: Speaker Recognition
voice.description: Voice profiles with speaker identification and filtering.

proactive.title: Proactive Coach
proactive.description: AI coach that helps with health, productivity, and goals.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: Self-hosted with encrypted storage and zero telemetry.

howItWorks.title: From chaos to clarity
howItWorks.subtitle: A continuous loop that transforms raw interactions into actionable knowledge.

capture.title: Capture
capture.description: Record thoughts, conversations, and decisions as they happen.

understand.title: Understand
understand.description: AI classifies intent, filters noise, and extracts meaning.

remember.title: Remember
remember.description: Vectorized and indexed for instant semantic retrieval.

assist.title: Assist
assist.description: Proactive insights and contextual answers when you need them.

proactive.title: An AI coach that actually helps
proactive.description: Runs twice daily to analyze patterns and provide suggestions.
